item.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell signals path to rate cuts at Jackson Hole
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has been under pressure from President Trump to lower the central bank's benchmark interest rate.

item.title: Lyle Menendez set for parole board hearing day after brother was denied
